mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_review (product_id, member_id, content, rating) VALUES (#{productId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT id as id ,product_id as productId ,member_id as memberId ,content as content ,rating as rating ,created_at as createdAt ,updated_at as updatedAt FROM product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
